mapper.sql: id, number, name, username, password, phone, department, position, address, yhzh, createId, createTime, delflag,sex,borndate,nation,idcard,job,groupId
mapper.insert: insert into cguser (number, name, username, password, phone, department, position, address, yhzh, createId, createTime, delflag,sex,borndate,nation,idcard,job,groupId) values (#{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{delflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{borndate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update cguser set number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department = #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yhzh = #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex=#{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, borndate=#{borndate,jdbcType=DATE}, nation=#{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard=#{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job=#{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, groupId=#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update cguser set delflag = 'D' where id = #{id}
